reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Radiant Double Cleanse Experience
reviews.reviewText: The Face Shop Rice Water Bright Light Face Cleansing Foam has transformed my skincare routine, delivering a refreshing and illuminating double cleanse experience that caters to all skin types. This set, featuring a cleansing foam has become a staple for effortlessly removing makeup, dead skin, and impurities while providing hydration and brightening effects.It is a gentle yet effective cleanser that lathers into a rich foam. Its refreshing texture not only cleanses my skin thoroughly but also imparts a sense of rejuvenation. Suitable for all skin types, the cleansing foam removes impurities, makeup, and dead skin cells without stripping away essential moisture.One of the standout features is its brightening effect. The infusion of rice water extract contributes to a more luminous complexion over time. I've noticed an improvement in the overall radiance and clarity of my skin since incorporating these products into my routine.Highly recommended for anyone looking to achieve clean, hydrated, and radiant skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Radiance Unleashed: THEFACESHOP Rice Water Bright Foam Cleanser Transforms Your Skincare Routine
reviews.reviewText: Embarking on a journey to achieve radiant and clear skin led me to THEFACESHOP Rice Water Bright Foam Cleanser, and let me tell you, it's been a game-changer. This cleanser has become the shining star in my skincare routine, delivering a thorough cleanse that leaves my skin looking and feeling revitalized.The texture of the foam is incredibly lightweight, creating a luxurious lather that effortlessly glides across the skin. The Rice Water Bright Foam Cleanser doesn't just cleanse; it pampers. The gentle formula feels like a spa treatment, effectively removing impurities and makeup residue without stripping my skin of essential moisture.What sets this cleanser apart is its brightening power. Enriched with rice water, it not only cleanses but also works to promote a more even skin tone. Over time, I've noticed a visible improvement in the clarity and radiance of my complexion. It's like a boost of vitality with every wash, making it an essential step in my pursuit of luminous skin.The scent is subtle and refreshing, adding a sensory element to my skincare routine. The cleanser's fragrance is not overpowering, making it suitable for those with sensitivity to strong scents. The delightful aroma enhances the overall experience, creating a moment of relaxation as I cleanse away the stresses of the day.The 150ml size is generous, and a little goes a long way. I appreciate the cost-effectiveness of this product, as it lasts for an extended period, making it a budget-friendly addition to my skincare regimen. The packaging is practical and aesthetically pleasing, with a convenient pump dispenser that ensures just the right amount of product every time.The brightening effect and gentle cleansing power make THEFACESHOP Rice Water Bright Foam Cleanser a staple for anyone seeking a radiant complexion. It has earned its place as a must-have in my skincare collection, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to those who crave a cleanser that not only cleans but also illuminates. Transform your skincare routine with this radiant gem – your skin will thank you for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a gentle, effective cleanser that leaves your skin feeling soft, smooth, and bright, The Face Shop Rice Water Bright Light Face Cleansing Foam is a fantastic choice. This cleanser is enriched with rice water extract, which is known for its brightening and hydrating properties, as well as natural ingredients like soapwort extract and moringa oil that help to gently remove impurities without stripping the skin of its natural oils.What sets this cleansing foam apart from others is its light and fluffy texture that transforms into a creamy lather upon contact with water. It feels luxurious and pampering on the skin, and it's gentle enough to use every day without causing any irritation or dryness. Plus, the bright and refreshing scent is a delightful way to start or end your day.Overall, The Face Shop Rice Water Bright Light Face Cleansing Foam is a high-quality cleanser that delivers on its promises. It's affordable, effective, and a joy to use, making it a must-have addition to any skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very thick...great results
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser is way thicker than expected and like others have said a little goes a long way. My face felt incredibly clean but not incredibly hydrated and this was one of the reasons I purchased it. That said when I combined this with the I'm from toner and face cream holy cow!! My skin absolutely glowed! I'm going to try using slightly less to see if that leaves the skin more hydrated because I may have used a little too much and it seemed to dry the skin out. If you want squeaky clean, this is going to do the job. I couldn't detect any scent at all.
A little goes a long way! This beautiful cleanser really does its job, getting deep into your pores and clearing them out! My face felt so smooth when rinsed. I’ll definitely buy again!
It's really good and worth buying.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very high-quality and they’re so good
reviews.reviewText: まだ使ってる感じ感じだからしっかりわからないけど多分いいだと思います。みんないっぱい買ってね。

"I am in love with this rice water face cleanser! It's gentle yet effective at removing dirt and impurities from my skin. The rice powder exfoliates my skin without being too harsh, leaving my skin feeling soft and smooth. I also love the fact that it's made with natural ingredients and free from harsh chemicals. It has a pleasant fragrance and doesn't dry out my skin. I highly recommend this face cleanser to anyone looking for a high-quality and safe skincare product."

This has Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), so I don't really like it. The highest risk of using products with SLS and SLES is irritation to your eyes, skin, mouth, and lungs. For people with sensitive skin, sulfates may also clog pores and cause acne.
